text: The Great Mass is the eighth studio album by Greek death metal band Septicflesh. It was recorded between July–September 2010 in Devasoundz (Greece) and The Abyss (Sweden) and produced by Peter Tägtgren. The orchestration was written by Christos Antoniou and recorded by the Prague Philharmonic Orchestra. Upon release, "The Great Mass" received universal acclaim from both music critics and band fans. ==Track listing== All lyrics written by Sotiris V., all music composed by Septicflesh, symphonic tracks performed by the Prague Philharmonic Orchestra. ==Personnel== {| |valign="top"| ; Septicflesh * Christos Antoniou - lead guitar, orchestrations * Sotiris Anunnaki V - clean vocals, rhythm guitar * Seth Siro Anton - Brutal vocals, bass, artwork * Fotis Benardo - drums, percussion ; Additional musicians * Philharmonic Orchestra And Choir Of Prague ** Stanislav Mistr - choir master ** Adam Klemens - orchestra conductor * Androniki Skoula (Chaostar) - vocals * Iliana Tsakiraki (Enemy Of Reality) - vocals * George Diamantopoulos (Chaostar) - kaval, yayli tanbur |width="10"| |valign="top"| ; Production * Fotis Benardo - sound engineering * George Emmanuel - sound engineering * Steve Venardo - sound engineering * Jan Holzner - sound engineering * Michal Hradisky - sound engineering * Peter Tägtgren - producer, mixing * Jonas Kjellgren - mastering * Jon Simvonis - photography * Petr Pycha - music contractor, recording manager |} ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- !Chart (2011) !Peak position |- !scope="row"|French Albums (SNEP) |132 |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Formats ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Label |- | CD | Europe | April 18, 2011 | Season of Mist |- | CD | North America | April 19, 2011 | Season of Mist |- | CD | Japan | September 21, 2011 | Nippon Columbia |} ==References== Category:2011 albums Category:Septicflesh albums Category:Season of Mist albums Category:Albums with cover art by Spiros Antoniou Category:Albums produced by Peter Tägtgren
title: The Great Mass
